heroMainText: Everything you need to manage real estate sales in one place...
heroToolsText: Powerful and easy tools that help you achieve sales quickly and accurately

items.question: What is HiEstate and who is it for?
items.answer: HiEstate is a specialized Real Estate CRM designed for brokerage firms, developers, and sales teams in the MENA region. It replaces scattered spreadsheets and notebooks with a single, powerful system to manage leads, units, and sales teams efficiently.

items.question: Do I need a technical team to install HiEstate?
items.answer: Not at all. HiEstate is a cloud-based solution (SaaS), meaning you can start using it immediately without installing any software. We handle all the hosting, security, and updates for you.

items.question: Is HiEstate suitable for small brokerage teams?
items.answer: Absolutely. We built HiEstate to support growth. Whether you are a team of 3 agents or a company with 100+ employees, the system scales with your needs, ensuring you organize your leads and close more deals from day one.

items.question: Does the system support Arabic language?
items.answer: Yes, HiEstate is fully bilingual (Arabic & English). Your team can use the interface in their preferred language, and you can switch instantly between them.

items.question: Can I manage both sales and rentals on HiEstate?
items.answer: Yes. The system has dedicated workflows for both Resale/Primary Sales and Rentals, allowing you to track inventory and deals separately with the appropriate details for each.

items.question: Does HiEstate integrate with social media campaigns?
items.answer: Yes. We directly integrate with Facebook Lead Forms and other digital channels. Leads from your campaigns land directly in your CRM, assigned to agents instantly so they can be contacted within minutes.

items.question: Can I import my existing data from Excel?
items.answer: Yes, we provide a smart import tool that allows you to upload your existing lists of leads, units, and contacts from Excel or Google Sheets easily, so you don't lose any historical data.

items.question: How does HiEstate help me monitor my sales team?
items.answer: Our 'Smart Insights' dashboard gives you real-time visibility into every agent's performance—calls made, meetings booked, and deals closed. You can track commissions and ensure everyone is hitting their targets.

items.question: Can I control what my agents see?
items.answer: Yes. HiEstate has a robust permission system. You can decide who sees which leads, who can export data, and who can edit unit availability, ensuring your sensitive business data stays secure.

items.question: How does the system handle duplication of leads?
items.answer: We have an intelligent duplicate detection system that alerts you if a lead is entered or imported more than once, preventing conflicts between agents and ensuring professional communication with clients.

items.question: Do you offer a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card is required, allowing you to test the system with your team before committing.

items.question: Are there any setup fees?
items.answer: No. Our monthly or annual subscription covers everything, including standard on-boarding. We believe in transparent pricing with no hidden costs.

items.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, flexibility is key. You can adjust your plan as your team grows or your needs change.

items.question: Is my data secure with HiEstate?
items.answer: Data security is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption and host your data on secure servers with regular backups. You own your data completely.

items.question: What kind of support do you provide?
items.answer: Our support team is based in the region and understands your business. We offer support via chat, email, and phone during business hours, along with a comprehensive knowledge base and training videos.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to HiEstate (https://hiestate.app), a service provided by Hi-Solutions. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

sections.heading: Use of Service
sections.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content, features, and functionality of HiEstate are the exclusive property of Hi-Solutions and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

sections.heading: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall Hi-Solutions, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.

sections.heading: Information Collection
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact customer support.

sections.heading: Use of Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to monitor and analyze trends and usage.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and destruction.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your activity on our services and store certain information.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@hi-solutions.co or visit our website at https://hiestate.app.

refund_page.title: Refund Policy
refund_page.intro: At Hi-Solutions, we want you to be completely satisfied with our services.
refund_page.guarantee_content: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all our subscription plans. If you are not satisfied with our service for any reason, you can request a full refund within 14 days of your initial purchase, no questions asked.

sections.heading: How to Request a Refund
sections.content: To initiate a refund, please contact our support team at support@hi-solutions.co with your order details. We will process your request within 5-7 business days.

sections.heading: Exclusions
sections.content: Refunds are not available after the 14-day period has expired. This guarantee applies only to your first subscription purchase.
